name: EvenorOddDay
0:
”Alexa, ask even or odd day tomorrow”
”Alexa, ask even or odd day is tomorrow even”
”Alexa, ask even or odd day is next Sunday odd”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: even or odd day
des: Ask Alexa if the current date or any other date corresponds to an even or odd day of the year
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
